game.name: Guess the Superhero
game.description:
Are you a fan of popular superheroes? Do the stories of Comic DC or Marvel excite you? If yes, trying out Guess the Superhero can be a nice bet for you. Your objective in this brand new arcade game is to guess superheroes by seeing the pictures. When you click the play button, a picture on the screen will be shown. All you need to do is guess his name using the alphabets shown on the bottom of the screen. 

Put your logic analysis and work power to the test to guess the name of your favorite superhero! Type the letters of your choice in the box shown on the screen and get a chance to grab some coins for your every successful effort in this html5 puzzle game! You can use those coins for hints and complete the quiz fast. The screen will show you an abstract picture of a superhero. This comic book superhero theme based game will attract you especially if you are a fan of comic book culture.  

Your score will depend upon how many popular superheroes you will be able to identify. Choose the letters to piece their names together in this lovely and friendly quiz game! You can also use the hints in case of being confused or are stuck during the gameplay. Track your coins on the right top of the screen! Put your right guess in the box to move to the next level! Guess images of Wonder Woman, Batman and more for free on atmegame.com and have fun without download!
game.metaTitle: Guess the Superhero, Puzzle Games - Play Online Free : Atmegame.com
